item.description:
Studio Meet up

This will be at my studio in Derry NH at 2pm.

This will be a basic studio session open to 5 photographers.
I will go over my basic style of lighting and posing. I will look into getting a model for this session but if i can't find one we can take turns being the subject. If anyone knows of a model or a person who would like to model please let me know.

Photographer must have an SLR camera to attend.
item.name: Basic Studio portrait shoot.
